College major 1

Source: R/gss_vars_11.R
major1.Rd

major1

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question What was your major or field of study when you received your (RESPONDENT'S COLLEGE DEGREE) degree? IF THE RESPONDENT RECEIVED MORE THAN ONE GRADUATE LEVEL DEGREE, ASK ABOUT THE HIGHEST DEGREE OBTAINED (E.G. ABOUT A Ph.D. RATHER THAN AN M.B.A). (COUNT UP TO 2 MENTIONS)
